channel.description: Recent content in leetcode on PattySung

item.title: Leetcode-
item.description: <解題> Time: O() Space: O()

item.title: Leetcode-117. Populating Next Right Pointers in Each Node II
item.description: Given a binary tree struct Node { int val; Node *left; Node *right; Node *next; } Populate each next pointer to point to its next right node.

item.title: Leetcode-73. Set Matrix Zeroes
item.description: Given an m x n integer matrix matrix, if an element is 0, set its entire row and column to 0’s.

item.title: Leetcode-118. Pascal's Triangle
item.description: Given an integer numRows, return the first numRows of Pascal’s triangle.

item.title: Leetcode-133. Clone Graph
item.description: Given a reference of a node in a connected undirected graph.

item.title: Leetcode-200. Number of Islands
item.description: Given an m x n 2D binary grid grid which represents a map of ‘1’s (land) and ‘0’s (water), return the number of islands.

item.title: Leetcode-79. Word Search
item.description: Given an m x n grid of characters board and a string word, return true if word exists in the grid.

item.title: Leetcode-1791. Find Center of Star Graph
item.description: There is an undirected star graph consisting of n nodes labeled from 1 to n.

item.title: Leetcode-1971. Find if Path Exists in Graph
item.description: There is a bi-directional graph with n vertices, where each vertex is labeled from 0 to n - 1 (inclusive).

item.title: Leetcode-997. Find the Town Judge
item.description: In a town, there are n people labeled from 1 to n.

item.title: Leetcode-230. Kth Smallest Element in a BST
item.description: Given the root of a binary search tree, and an integer k, return the kth smallest value (1-indexed) of all the values of the nodes in the tree.

item.title: Leetcode-105. Construct Binary Tree from Preorder and Inorder Traversal
item.description: Given two integer arrays preorder and inorder where preorder is the preorder traversal of a binary tree and inorder is the inorder traversal of the same tree, construct and return the binary tree.

item.title: Leetcode-101. Symmetric Tree
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree, check whether it is a mirror of itself (i.

item.title: Leetcode-112. Path Sum
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree and an integer targetSum, return true if the tree has a root-to-leaf path such that adding up all the values along the path equals targetSum.

item.title: Leetcode-235. Lowest Common Ancestor of a Binary Search Tree
item.description: Given a binary search tree (BST), find the lowest common ancestor (LCA) node of two given nodes in the BST.

item.title: Leetcode-236. Lowest Common Ancestor of a Binary Tree
item.description: Given a binary tree, find the lowest common ancestor (LCA) of two given nodes in the tree.

item.title: Leetcode-530. Minimum Absolute Difference in BST
item.description: Given the root of a Binary Search Tree (BST), return the minimum absolute difference between the values of any two different nodes in the tree.

item.title: Leetcode-637. Average of Levels in Binary Tree
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree, return the average value of the nodes on each level in the form of an array.

item.title: Leetcode-100. Same Tree
item.description: Given the roots of two binary trees p and q, write a function to check if they are the same or not.

item.title: Leetcode-110. Balanced Binary Tree
item.description: Given a binary tree, determine if it is height-balanced. Example 1:

item.title: Leetcode-572. Subtree of Another Tree
item.description: Given the roots of two binary trees root and subRoot, return true if there is a subtree of root with the same structure and node values of subRoot and false otherwise.

item.title: Queue
item.description: 在使用 Java 的 Queue 接口時，可以使用以下方法進行操作： offer(element): 將元素插入到佇列的尾部，如果成功插入，返回 true；如果無法插入（例如因為佇列已滿），返回 false。 add(element): 將元素插入到佇列的尾部，如果成功插入，返回 true；如果無法插入（例如因為佇列已滿），則拋出一個 unchecked 異常（IllegalStateException）。

item.title: Leetcode-104. Maximum Depth of Binary Tree
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree, return its maximum depth.

item.title: Leetcode-226. Invert Binary Tree
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree, invert the tree, and return its root.

item.title: Leetcode-387. First Unique Character in a String
item.description: Given a string s, find the first non-repeating character in it and return its index.

item.title: Leetcode-543. Diameter of Binary Tree
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree, return the length of the diameter of the tree.

item.title: Leetcode-704. Binary Search
item.description: Given an array of integers nums which is sorted in ascending order, and an integer target, write a function to search target in nums.

item.title: Leetcode-739. Daily Temperatures
item.description: <解題>

item.title: Leetcode-234. Palindrome Linked List
item.description: Given the head of a singly linked list, return true if it is a palindrome or false otherwise.

item.title: Leetcode-71. Simplify Path
item.description: Given a string path, which is an absolute path (starting with a slash ‘/’) to a file or directory in a Unix-style file system, convert it to the simplified canonical path.

item.title: Leetcode-20. Valid Parentheses
item.description: Given a string s containing just the characters ‘(’, ‘)’, ‘{’, ‘}’, ‘[’ and ‘]’, determine if the input string is valid.

item.title: Leetcode-160. Intersection of Two Linked Lists
item.description: Given the heads of two singly linked-lists headA and headB, return the node at which the two lists intersect.

item.title: Leetcode-232. Implement Queue using Stacks
item.description: Implement a first in first out (FIFO) queue using only two stacks.

item.title: Leetcode-82. Remove Duplicates from Sorted List II
item.description: Given the head of a sorted linked list, delete all nodes that have duplicate numbers, leaving only distinct numbers from the original list.

item.title: Leetcode-83. Remove Duplicates from Sorted List
item.description: Given the head of a sorted linked list, delete all duplicates such that each element appears only once.

item.title: Leetcode-151. Reverse Words in a String*
item.description: Given an input string s, reverse the order of the words.

item.title: Leetcode-189. Rotate Array
item.description: Given an integer array nums, rotate the array to the right by k steps, where k is non-negative.

item.title: Leetcode-19. Remove Nth Node From End of List
item.description: Given the head of a linked list, remove the nth node from the end of the list and return its head.

item.title: Leetcode-217. Contains Duplicate
item.description: Given an integer array nums, return true if any value appears at least twice in the array, and return false if every element is distinct.

item.title: Leetcode-61. Rotate List
item.description: Given the head of a linked list, rotate the list to the right by k places.

item.title: Leetcode-80. Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array II
item.description: Given an integer array nums sorted in non-decreasing order, remove some duplicates in-place such that each unique element appears at most twice.

item.title: Leetcode-2. Add Two Numbers
item.description: You are given two non-empty linked lists representing two non-negative integers.

item.title: Leetcode-206. Reverse Linked List
item.description: Given the head of a singly linked list, reverse the list, and return the reversed list.

item.title: Leetcode-21. Merge Two Sorted Lists
item.description: You are given the heads of two sorted linked lists list1 and list2.

item.title: Leetcode-1. Two Sum
item.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

item.title: Leetcode-141. Linked List Cycle
item.description: Given head, the head of a linked list, determine if the linked list has a cycle in it.

item.title: Leetcode-55. Jump Game
item.description: You are given an integer array nums. You are initially positioned at the array’s first index, and each element in the array represents your maximum jump length at that position.

item.title: Leetcode-121. Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
item.description: You are given an array prices where prices[i] is the price of a given stock on the ith day.

item.title: Leetcode-122. Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock II
item.description: You are given an integer array prices where prices[i] is the price of a given stock on the ith day.

item.title: Leetcode-242. Valid Anagram
item.description: Given two strings s and t, return true if t is an anagram of s, and false otherwise.

item.title: Leetcode-26. Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array
item.description: Given an integer array nums sorted in non-decreasing order, remove the duplicates in-place such that each unique element appears only once.

item.title: Leetcode-27. Remove Element
item.description: Given an integer array nums and an integer val, remove all occurrences of val in nums in-place.

item.title: Leetcode-28. Find the Index of the First Occurrence in a String
item.description: Given two strings needle and haystack, return the index of the first occurrence of needle in haystack, or -1 if needle is not part of haystack.

item.title: Leetcode-49. Group Anagrams
item.description: Given an array of strings strs, group the anagrams together. You can return the answer in any order.

item.title: Leetcode-55. Jump Game
item.description: You are given an integer array nums. You are initially positioned at the array’s first index, and each element in the array represents your maximum jump length at that position.

item.title: Leetcode-88. Merge Sorted Array
item.description: You are given two integer arrays nums1 and nums2, sorted in non-decreasing order, and two integers m and n, representing the number of elements in nums1 and nums2 respectively.

item.title: Leetcode-13. Roman to Integer
item.description: Roman numerals are represented by seven different symbols: I, V, X, L, C, D and M.

item.title: Leetcode-58. Length of Last Word
item.description: Given a string s consisting of words and spaces, return the length of the last word in the string.
